questions.quote: Well, buddy,  he's taking the case!  Jackie Chiles is right on it!  Right on it, he's all over it!
You know, I used to love Paris. My uh, dead Fiancée, Susan..  In fact I. think I, I may have a picture of her..
W--then I'm pretty much where I am now. At least I got to take a ride on a spaceship.
Oh no! >click click< Kramer, this phone's a piece of junk, goodbye!
Well, I wouldn't have minded it so much but I was running home to go to the bathroom.
You know what? The hell with this party, I don't even want to go to begin with.
Jerry, that is so ridiculous. But, George didn't even have his glasses on!
You know a friend of my father's used to live right around here.  Mike Wichter.  He sold plastic straws.  You know the ones?  You could bend them.
George, forget about the shoes. Want you to do something for me . This handicapped woman had an accident. Somebody gave her a used wheelchair with defective brakes.
Well, I'm sure at some point between the years 800 and 1200--somewhere--there were two women living together.
